title: Screen lock code
content:
Why, Google? Why?

My Pixel 2 xl insists that I push the "Enter" key after I unlock my screen with the 4 digit code that I set up initially. But WHY!? It adds no extra security to require a fifth selection if it is the "Enter" key. All of my Samsung phones unlocked after the 4th number in the code was selected - SMART.  Btw... Yes - I have asked Google. Nobody can answer the riddle.

Thanks for any advice...
Casey K 
Ouch. My finger hurts.
